title: [OCE] Support Mains Club
body:
This is for support mains that would like to join a club, I've just made it but I'd love to create one with a supportive and friendly environment specifically for support mains.
The only thing required is that you enjoy supporting, and of course are in OCE! :D
As I have just made it, there is no tag, suggestions are gladly accepted. 
Add me to be added

Summoner Name: Azuress
{{champion:40}} {{champion:117}} {{champion:25}} {{champion:267}} {{summoner:3}} {{item:2045}}

replies.body: Just send me a request to join :)

Is this club still active? I'm interested in a support main club and this seems to be the only one. I've hit you up with a friend request!
 <3 {{champion:432}}
Cool! But I can't play ranked yet as I don't have 16 champions. May I join anyway?
